pages.title: Raiding the Pantry
pages.text: With these ingredients, I think it should be possible to open a gate to that place... Yes... I suppose it's time I tell you about that. When i was younger, my colleagues and I maintained a pocket dimension for storing some of our more $(o)unstable$() research. We had to abandon it due to out of control self-replicating $(thing)Golems$(), but left many things behind when we
did. Some of the materials stored there should be particularly useful to our cause.

pages.heading: Dungeon Raid
pages.description: Teleports you directly to the raid.$(br)$(o)Warning: preparing armour first is advised$()
